title: HospiOS
subtitle: A comprehensive hospital management system (EPR)
description: A modern Electronic Patient Record system that helps hospitals manage patient data, appointments, and medical records efficiently. Features include real-time updates, collaborative note-taking, and secure document management.

title: PowerSales
subtitle: An intelligent sales CRM platform
description: A modern CRM system designed for sales teams to manage leads, track opportunities, and analyze performance. Features include AI-powered insights, automated follow-ups, and comprehensive reporting.

title: 4Site
subtitle: Smart building monitoring platform
description: An IoT platform that enables real-time monitoring of building systems through sensor networks. Provides insights into energy usage, occupancy, and environmental conditions to optimize building operations.

title: TopLegal
subtitle: AI-powered legal contract management
description: A sophisticated legal contract management system that streamlines the creation, review, and management of legal documents. Features AI-assisted contract analysis and automated workflows.
